title: 整合包JAVA路径问题
author: museshengdi
txt_content:
下了个整合包，怎么修改默认的JAVA路径
@echo OFF

java -Xmx1024M -Xms1024M -jar cauldron-1.7.10-1.1206.01.170-server.jar
PAUSE

replies.author: OAO_miao
replies.txt_content:
把后面那行里的java替换成完整路径
比如这样:
"%ProgramFiles%\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe"  -Xmx1024M -Xms1024M  -jar "cauldron-1.7.10-1.1206.01.170-server.jar"复制代码
或者
"C:\Program Files\Java\jre8\bin\javaw.exe"  -Xmx1024M -Xms1024M  -jar "cauldron-1.7.10-1.1206.01.170-server.jar"复制代码
